"Afin":
"よう相棒、ちょっといいか？
頼みたいことがあるんだけどよ……"

"とりあえず、時間あるときでいいから
おれのところまで来てくれよ。
んじゃ、頼んだぜ。"
"『クライアントオーダー』について"

"As you progress through the game, your character may get requests on occasion. These are called 'Client Orders'.

The nature of the clients requests vary, and may involve things like taking instructions to clear a certain quest or being asked to gather certain items."

"In the case of defeating enemies and gathering their items, if you have not received a client order to do so, they will not drop their items.

Make sure to inform the individual once the objective have been achieved. You can receive an expression of gratitude.

Once you've progressed further in the game, you can try to talk to other characters. You might be able to get new client orders."

"アフィンはゲートエリア・西クエストカウンター側にいます。
訪ねてみましょう。"
